quest.name: My First Fishing Rod
journal: Sisipu would like to assign you your first task.

In order to test your understanding of the basics, Sisipu has bid you catch five Lominsan anchovies. These fish can be found in the waters surrounding Limsa Lominsa, including those directly outside the Fishermen's Guild.

Before Sisipu can appraise your anchovies, Guildmaster Wawalago makes an appearance to do it for her. The fisherwoman takes the opportunity to chide the netmaster for neglecting his duties, but Wawalago remains unfazed. In any case, the two of them acknowledge your mastery of the fishing fundamentals, and encourage you to expand your horizons.

※The next fisher quest will be available from Sisipu upon reaching level 5.

dialogue.name: SISIPU
dialogue.text: You're looking quite formidable. Let's hope you don't scare all the fish away.

dialogue.name: SISIPU
dialogue.text: Now, the first rule of fishing is to hold on to your rod: take care of your rod, and your rod will take care of you. Let me know if I'm going too fast for you.

dialogue.name: SISIPU
dialogue.text: Since you're new here, we're going to start small, and they don't come much smaller than anchovies.

dialogue.name: SISIPU
dialogue.text: You'll find schools of anchovies swimming around outside in Galadion Bay, so you can catch your meager supper without even walking ten yalms.

dialogue.name: SISIPU
dialogue.text: Anchovies are hardly the most cunning fish in the sea, making them an ideal first assignment. Simply bait a hook with some of those lugworms I gave you, dip it in the water, and the fish will practically catch themselves.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To catch Lominsan anchovies for Sisipu, first select a suitable lure using the Bait action. Next, approach the water and use the Cast action to begin fishing.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: When you feel a tug on your line, use the Hook action to reel in your catch.

dialogue.name: SISIPU
dialogue.text: Anchovies swim off every shore of Limsa Lominsa, so you can bring them back from anywhere you like...so long as it's not the fishmongers'.

dialogue.name: WAWALAGO
dialogue.text: (-???-)Here 'chovy, 'chovy! Here 'chovy, 'chovy! Fair flock of feisty fish you've got, giddy guppy! Careful they don't slip out of sight!

dialogue.name: SISIPU
dialogue.text: W-Wawalago!? To what do we owe the...pleasure?

dialogue.name: WAWALAGO
dialogue.text: A guildmaster's got to get after the guppies─dividing up the daily drudgery, picking out a proper potable, and some such support and service.

dialogue.name: SISIPU
dialogue.text: And who gets after the guildmaster? We have books to balance, you know─books you should be balancing!

dialogue.name: WAWALAGO
dialogue.text: I did my best to balance the books, but the bilge keel bent the bow back, bouncing the whole batch off the boat!

dialogue.name: SISIPU
dialogue.text: That's not what─ You know it was just an expression!

dialogue.name: SISIPU
dialogue.text: <sigh> But that's neither here nor there. So long as you keep at the bit, Forename, our books will balance themselves.

dialogue.name: SISIPU
dialogue.text: Don't let that go to your head, of course. Any beginner can snag some anchovies, but you'll need to experiment with different lures and explore new waters if you want to catch the big ones.

dialogue.name: WAWALAGO
dialogue.text: Fundamentals are fine, but the fun is fishing for new finds. Like my uncle always said, “Fishing's like philanderin'─ye never know what ye'll catch!”

dialogue.name: SISIPU
dialogue.text: ...And with those well-spoken words of wisdom, we will leave you to your wiles.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The next fisher quest will be available from Sisipu upon reaching level 5.

obj.n: All the Fish in the Sea
